# chronosphere_blackhole_alert_notifier (Resource)

Manages a Chronosphere Blackhole Alert Notifier.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "chronosphere_blackhole_alert_notifier" "test" {
  name = "Blackhole for Testing"
}
```
